enchantment.sifu.carve.desc: Reduces the target's protection with each attack. After attacking for a while, Right-clicking can trigger a healing effect.
enchantment.sifu.parry.desc: Counter the target attack and stun them for a second
enchantment.sifu.thousandneedle.desc: Shoots needles from the sky. The number of needles increases with the status effect amplifier.
